name: Cover the space that's on the same position as this goal (Chip-In Bingo / Bingo Clubber)
30.0 points without multipliers (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
Exactly 95 pins in two frames (100-Pin Pro / Triple Whammy)
70 points without hitting a green (+2) mole (Tennis Moles / Mole Commotion)
Win 4 matches against different CPUs / CPU teams
Silver medal (Homer Hero / Home Run Hero)
Finish all sports plus (All Sports + rules)
No medal while sinking 5 balls (Pro Putter / Putter Madness)
Smash 10 plates with uppercuts (Plate Smasher / Pro Puncher)
230 points without collecting stars (Spare Pickups / Shoot for the Spares)
Finish any Lakeside 3-hole course, no GiveUp (Golf)
